45  PL_NODE_SIZE,

50 // plGraphNode represents a node of a plGraph
51 struct plGraphNode {
52  int x; // x coordinate of the node in Xfig units.
53  int y; // y coordinate of the node in Xfig units.
54  unsigned int level; // Level of the node. Root nodes have level 0.
55  std::vector <std::string> vars; // Variables names on the node.
56  std::set <unsigned int> parent; // Set of parents ids of the node.
57  std::vector <unsigned int> son; // Vector of sons ids of the node.
58  std::string distribution_label; // Contains the distribution label of the node
59  // e.g. P(S | K) where S is the set of variables
60  // of the node and K is the set of parents of the
61  // node.
62 };
63

74 class PL_DLL_API plGraph :public plObject
75 {
76 protected:
77  SPL_ACCESS1(plGraph);
78 
79  unsigned int figure_border_width_; // Figure border width

plGraphDesignType
Indicates which parameter will be provided among (i) font size, (ii) the node size, or (iii) the paper size.
